languageKey.label: Questionaire results.
Displays all results from the questionaire that have been finished.
tx_pbsurvey_item
Use this to temporarily exclude this result from display and export to csv file with the module Web > Questionaire.
Setting this option is practical when exporting the results to a csv file. You can, for instance, exclude this result that was meant for testing purposes only.
The title of the questionaire that generated this result.

Do not change this field if you want reliable results from the questionaire. Changing this field will exclude the result from being exported to a csv file if the questions do not match the ones of the questionaire that generated this result.
tx_pbsurvey_item
The name of the frontend user who participated in the questionaire.

When a questionaire has been taken among logged-in frontend users, the user who participated will be displayed here.
When a questionaire has been taken anonymously, this field will be empty.
This field will be used by the module "Web > Questionaire" to extract the users personal information from the table "fe_users" and insert this information in the csv file.
tx_pbsurvey_item, fe_users
Field containing all answers from a single response.
Do not change this field unless you know what you are doing.
tx_pbsurvey
